sqlMap.select: select dept_num deptNum, dept_name deptName from $frameSchema$.ac_department ad where ad.parent_id = (select ap.dept_id from $frameSchema$.ac_personnel ap where ap.work_no = #workNo#) and ad.dict_type = '业务区划' union select distinct dept_code deptNum, dept_name deptName from $frameSchema$.wz_user where work_no = #workNo#

SELECT d1.dept_num as "deptNum", d1.dept_name as "deptName", d2.dept_num as "parentDeptNum", d2.dept_name as "parentDeptName" FROM $frameSchema$.ac_department d1 left join $frameSchema$.ac_department d2 on d1.parent_id = d2.id WHERE d1.dict_type = '业务区划'
d1.dept_name like concat ('%', #deptName#, '%')
d1.dept_num asc
$orderBy$
